recipes.title: Roasted Brussels Sprouts with Lemon Zest
ingredients: 1 pound Brussels sprouts, trimmed and halved
directions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Toss Brussels sprouts with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Spread on a baking sheet and roast for 20-25 minutes.
Remove from oven and sprinkle with lemon zest before serving.

recipes.title: Steamed Asparagus with Garlic
directions: Steam asparagus until tender, about 5-7 minutes.
Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat and sauté garlic until fragrant.
Add steamed asparagus to the skillet and toss to coat.
Season with salt and pepper before serving.

recipes.title: Sautéed Spinach with Olive Oil and Garlic
directions: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add garlic and cook until fragrant.
Add spinach and cook until wilted, about 2-3 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper before serving.

recipes.title: Roasted Cauliflower with Turmeric
directions: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
Toss cauliflower with olive oil, turmeric, salt, and pepper.
Spread on a baking sheet and roast for 25-30 minutes, until golden and tender.

recipes.title: Steamed Green Beans with Almond Slivers
directions: Steam green beans until tender, about 5-7 minutes.
Heat olive oil in a skillet and toast almond slivers until golden.
Add steamed green beans to the skillet and toss with almonds.
Season with salt and pepper before serving.

recipes.title: Roasted Sweet Potatoes with Rosemary
ingredients: 1 pound sweet potatoes, peeled and cubed
directions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Toss sweet potatoes with olive oil, rosemary, salt, and pepper.
Spread on a baking sheet and roast for 30 minutes, until tender.

recipes.title: Grilled Zucchini with Balsamic Glaze
directions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Brush zucchini slices with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
Grill zucchini for 3-4 minutes per side.
Drizzle with balsamic glaze before serving.

recipes.title: Quinoa Salad with Cucumber and Tomato
directions: In a large bowl, combine quinoa, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, and red onion.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.
Season with salt and pepper and toss to combine.

recipes.title: Steamed Broccoli with Lemon Juice
directions: Steam broccoli until tender, about 5-7 minutes.
Drizzle with lemon juice and season with salt and pepper before serving.

recipes.title: Baked Butternut Squash with Cinnamon
directions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Toss squash with olive oil, cinnamon, and salt.
Spread on a baking sheet and bake for 30 minutes, until tender.

recipes.title: Cucumber and Avocado Salad
directions: In a bowl, combine cucumber, avocado, and red onion.
Drizzle with olive oil and lime juice.
Season with salt and pepper and toss gently to combine.

recipes.title: Baked Eggplant Parmesan
directions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Brush eggplant slices with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
Bake for 20 minutes, flipping halfway through.
Top each slice with marinara sauce, mozzarella, and Parmesan cheese.
Sprinkle breadcrumbs and oregano on top and bake for an additional 10 minutes.

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir-Fry with Tofu
directions: Heat sesame oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add tofu and cook until golden brown, about 5 minutes.
Remove tofu and set aside.
In the same skillet, add garlic and ginger and cook until fragrant.
Add bell pepper, carrot, and snap peas and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes.
Return tofu to the skillet, add soy sauce, and toss to combine.

recipes.title: Sweet Potato and Black Bean Tacos
ingredients: 1 large sweet potato, peeled and diced
1 can black beans, drained and rinsed
directions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Toss sweet potato with olive oil, chili powder, and cumin.
Spread on a baking sheet and roast for 20 minutes, until tender.
Warm tortillas and fill with roasted sweet potato, black beans, lettuce, tomatoes, and cilantro.

recipes.title: Chickpea and Spinach Curry
directions: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add onion and garlic and cook until softened.
Stir in curry powder and cook for 1 minute.
Add chickpeas, diced tomatoes, and salt, and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in spinach and cook until wilted.

recipes.title: Garlic Roasted Mushrooms
directions: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
Toss mushrooms with olive oil, garlic, salt, and pepper.
Spread on a baking sheet and roast for 20 minutes, until golden brown.

recipes.title: Cabbage and Carrot Slaw
directions: In a large bowl, combine cabbage and carrots.
In a small bowl, whisk together apple cider vinegar, olive oil, honey, salt, and pepper.
Pour dressing over cabbage mixture and toss to coat.

recipes.title: Spicy Roasted Chickpeas
directions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Toss chickpeas with olive oil, paprika, cayenne pepper, and salt.
Spread on a baking sheet and roast for 30 minutes, until crispy.

recipes.title: Lemon Garlic Roasted Potatoes
directions: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
Toss potatoes with olive oil, garlic, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread on a baking sheet and roast for 30 minutes, until golden and tender.

recipes.title: Baked Avocado Eggs
directions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Place avocado halves in a baking dish.
Crack an egg into each avocado half.
Season with salt and pepper.
Bake for 12-15 minutes, until eggs are set.
Garnish with chopped chives if desired.

recipes.title: Mediterranean Chickpea Salad
directions: In a large bowl, combine chickpeas, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and olives.
Drizzle with olive oil and red wine vinegar.
Season with salt and pepper and toss to combine.

recipes.title: Cauliflower Rice Stir-Fry
ingredients: 1 head cauliflower, grated into rice-sized pieces
directions: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add garlic and bell pepper, and cook until softened.
Stir in cauliflower rice and frozen peas.
Cook for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add soy sauce and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes.

recipes.title: Lentil Soup with Spinach
directions: Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
Add onion, carrots, celery, and garlic and cook until softened.
Stir in lentils, diced tomatoes, and vegetable broth.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 25 minutes.
Stir in spinach and cook until wilted.
Season with salt and pepper before serving.

recipes.title: Apple Cinnamon Oatmeal
directions: In a medium pot, bring almond milk to a boil.
Add oats and reduce heat to simmer.
Cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Stir in diced apple, cinnamon, and honey.
Cook for an additional 5 minutes until the oats are tender.

recipes.title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
ingredients: 4 bell peppers, tops cut off and seeds removed
1 can black beans, drained and rinsed
directions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
In a large bowl, combine quinoa, black beans, corn, and half of the cheese.
Season with salt and pepper.
Stuff each bell pepper with the mixture and place in a baking dish.
Top with salsa and remaining cheese.
Bake for 30 minutes, until peppers are tender.
